title: Your weather update for Monday (21)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology said that several spells of light showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa, and Central provinces and Galle and Matara districts.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in Uva and Eastern provinces and the Mullaitivu district after 2.00 p.m.
Wind speed can increase up to 40 kmph at times in the Hambantota district.
